channel.title: "No response from server" Error Help
channel.description:
Hey guys.. Before you say anything, [b]I used search before posting this[/b], and all I could find were nooby posts about their 'mopar servers', connecting to other servers, an how it always came up with "error connecting to server"....
Anyways, mines different..
[u]Source[/u]: RichScape [u]Problem[/u]: I was testing out the Anti-SYI on my server just now and I forgot to change the name of the spam bot [b]from[/b] SYIpkpker to something random, hence Ipbanning myself (lol)..
Anyway, when I went to log in it came up with: [code]"Error connecting to server. Please try using a different world"[/code] So I thought 'oh yea, I'll just delete my Ip from IPbanned.txt and it'll be back to normal'. So I deleted my IP from IPbanned.txt, but it still comes up with the same error and preventing me from logging onto my server.
Is anyone able to help me with this?
Also, when I use my 'backup' server it's fine, but it's not as recent as what I'd like, and using this instead would cause me to lose a heap of work...
Help appreciated..

item.title: "No response from server" Error Help
item.dc:creator: @Arc_Angel Arc Angel
item.description:
@Arc_Angel wrote:

[quote=“legend-scape, post:3, topic:288870”]If you have ip’d yourself.

Goto the ipban logs in config folder.
& Delete your Ip from there.[/quote]
I deleted everything from IPbanned.txt and it still prevents me from logging on…
[red]Problem Fixed: Please Lock[/red]

Read full topic

item.title: "No response from server" Error Help
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

If you have ip’d yourself.

Goto the ipban logs in config folder.
& Delete your Ip from there.

Read full topic

item.title: "No response from server" Error Help
item.dc:creator: @HiddenPker HiddenPker
item.description:
@HiddenPker wrote:

This is very weird tbh… because normaly it would mean your ip is in the ipban logs… sorry I dont know how to help you there…

Read full topic

item.title: "No response from server" Error Help
item.dc:creator: @Arc_Angel Arc Angel
item.description:
@Arc_Angel wrote:

Hey guys…
Before you say anything, I used search before posting this, and all I could find were nooby posts about their ‘mopar servers’, connecting to other servers, an how it always came up with “error connecting to server”…

Anyways, mines different…

Source: RichScape
Problem: I was testing out the Anti-SYI on my server just now and I forgot to change the name of the spam bot from SYIpkpker to something random, hence Ipbanning myself (lol)…

Anyway, when I went to log in it came up with:

"Error connecting to server. Please try using a different world"

So I thought ‘oh yea, I’ll just delete my Ip from IPbanned.txt and it’ll be back to normal’.
So I deleted my IP from IPbanned.txt, but it still comes up with the same error and preventing me from logging onto my server.

Is anyone able to help me with this?

Also, when I use my ‘backup’ server it’s fine, but it’s not as recent as what I’d like, and using this instead would cause me to lose a heap of work…

Help appreciated…

Read full topic
